experience.summary:
-Selected for the competitive AWS Work Experience Cohort (via Delta Careers).-Collaborated in a team of 4 to build AllyEd, a Streamlit-based ML model predicting secondary student mental health risks.Engineered data preprocessing pipelines (imputation, scaling, PCA, SMOTE, label encoding) using Pandas and Scikit-learn, improving precision and recall. Reached 75%+ accuracy.-Applied algorithms including KNN, Logistic Regression, Decision Trees, and Neural Networks on datasets with 20,000+ samples.-Deployed solutions with AWS SageMaker and S3, gaining hands-on cloud experience.-Awarded 1st place among 10 teams after presenting to AWS executives.
            

    
    

    
        Show less

-Identified inefficiencies in the school’s paper-based music room booking system.-Designed and built a full-stack booking platform, including UX/UI prototypes in Figma, front-end development in HTML/CSS, and relational database design for scheduling automation.-Reduced administrative workload by 90% (from ~2 hours to 10 minutes per week), freeing staff time for higher-value tasks.-Strengthened expertise in user-centered design and translating theoretical knowledge into practical, real-world applications.
            

    
    

    
        Show less

education.college_degree_field: 4A* A level Maths, Further Maths, Physics and Computer Science & 9A*/1A IGCSE
